gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: Australian Marine Community Profile of ISO 19115:2005/19139

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: IMOS - Australian Bluewater Observing System (ABOS) Facility - Temperature and salinity time-series

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Website of the Integrated Marine Observing System (IMOS)

gmd:otherCitationDetails.gco:CharacterString: The citation in a list of references is: "IMOS [year-of-data-downloaded], [Title], [data-access-url], accessed [date-of-access]".

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The Australian Bluewater Observing System (ABOS) Facility provides the coordination of national efforts in the sustained observation of open ocean properties with particular emphasis on observations important to climate and carbon cycle studies. This collection contains time-series observations of temperature and salinity from moorings deployed by the ABOS Air-Sea Flux Stations (ASFS) and Deepwater Arrays (DA) sub-facilities. The primary parameters are temperature, pressure (when available) and depth of the instrument. A subset of this collection also includes conductivity and salinity. The observations were made using a range of temperature loggers, conductivity-temperature-depth (CTD) instruments, and temperature sensors on acoustic Doppler current profilers (ADCPs).

gmd:credit.gco:CharacterString: Integrated Marine Observing System (IMOS). IMOS is supported by the Australian Government through the National Collaborative Research Infrastructure Strategy (NCRIS) and the Super Science Initiative (SSI).
Funded by the National Collaborative Research Infrastructure Strategy (NCRIS) and the Super Science Initiative (SSI).

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Website of the eMarine Information Infrastructure (eMII)

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: NASA/Global Change Master Directory Earth Science Keywords Version 5.3.8
Marine Community Profile of ISO19115 v1.4 Geographic Extent Vocabulary (Annex C.1.2)

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Australian Ocean Data Centre Joint Facility (AODCJF)

gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: IMOS Facility | ABOS | Australian Bluewater Observing System

mcp:attributionConstraints.gco:CharacterString: The citation in a list of references is: "IMOS [year-of-data-download], [Title], [data-access-URL], accessed [date-of-access]."

Any users of IMOS data are required to clearly acknowledge the source of the material in the format: "Data was sourced from the Integrated Marine Observing System (IMOS) - IMOS is supported by the Australian Government through the National Collaborative Research Infrastructure Strategy and the Super Science Initiative." If relevant, also credit other organisations involved in collection of this particular datastream (as listed in 'credit' in the metadata record).

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: Data, products and services from IMOS are provided "as is" without any warranty as to fitness for a particular purpose.

mcp:term.gco:CharacterString: Depth below surface of the water body
Practical salinity of the water body
Electrical conductivity of the water body
Pressure (measured variable) in the water body exerted by overlying sea water and any medium above it
Pressure (measured variable) in the water body exerted by overlying sea water only

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Point of truth URL of this metadata record
Data available through the IMOS Thredds server
This OGC WFS service returns filtered geographic information. The returned data is available in multiple formats including CSV.
The BODAAC is a WFS service that returns a list of OpenDAP URLs matching a query.

gmd:dataset.gco:CharacterString: These data were obtained using a range of temperature sensors. Some of the instruments also record pressure, conductivity and other parameters. The raw data were processed to produce a single netCDF file per instrument. The processing includes: * Pre-processing tasks like local time to UTC time conversion; * Calculation of a depth parameter based on pressure values (recorded by the instrument itself, or the nearest two pressure sensors on the mooring) using the Gibbs-SeaWater toolbox (TEOS-10). * Automatic quality control (QC) procedures, checking for impossible date or location, measurements taken out of water, outliers, spikes and flatlines (suspect data are flagged but never removed); * A visual check of the data and QC flags by the operator; * Writing the data and QC flags to an IMOS compliant NetCDF files containing QC'd data sets. For more details see the metadata attached to each data set.

updateChildrenHelp.div:
More details Update all children related to current metadata record. Select the strategy to be applied on each main sections.
Add will preserve child section and add the parent equivalent section after the child ones. Replace will remove child section by parent equivalent section.
Children identifier, character set, language, parent identifier, hierarchy level, dataset URI and identification section (excluding extent and keywords) are always preserved. Parent locales are always replaced.
Distribution and maintenance section are always replaced (even in add mode) because ISO19115 does not allow to have more than one.

strings.computeExtentFromKeywordsHelp: Compute extent action analyses metadata keywords section and search for similar concept having an extent in all thesaurus available. One extent is added for each matching keywords. In "add" mode, existing extent are preserved. In "replace" mode, existing bounding box extent is removed (temporal, vertical and bounding polygon are preserved). Save your metadata record before launching the action.

help.div:
The following metadata elements shall be provided:
Resource title: This a characteristic, and often-unique, name by which the resource is known. The value domain of this metadata element is free text.
Resource abstract: This is a brief narrative summary of the content of the resource. The value domain of this metadata element is free text.
Resource type: This is the type of resource being described by the metadata. The value domain of this metadata element is defined in Part D.1.
Resource locator: The resource locator defines the link(s) to the resource and/or the link to additional information about the resource. The value domain of this metadata element is a character string, commonly expressed as Uniform Resource Locator (URL).
Unique resource identifier: A value uniquely identifying the resource. The value domain of this metadata element is a mandatory character string code, generally assigned by the data owner, and a character string namespace uniquely identifying the context of the identifier code (for example, the data owner).
Coupled resource: If the resource is a spatial data service, this metadata element identifies, where relevant, the target spatial data set(s) of the service through their Unique Resource Identifiers (URI). The value domain of this metadata element is a mandatory character string code, generally assigned by the data owner, and a character string namespace uniquely identifying the context of the identifier code (for example, the data owner).
Resource language: The language(s) used within the resource. The value domain of this metadata element is limited to the languages defined in ISO 639-2.

classification.title: Classification of spatial data and services

ul.li: Topic category: The topic category is a high-level classification scheme to assist in the grouping and topic-based search of available spatial data resources. The value domain of this metadata element is defined in Part D.2.

Spatial data service type: This is a classification to assist in the search of available spatial data services. A specific service shall be categorised in only one category. The value domain of this metadata element is defined in Part D.3.

help.div:
According to the INSPIRE Implementing Rule for Metadata, if a resource is a spatial data set or spatial data set series, at least one keyword shall be provided from the General Environmental Multi-lingual Thesaurus (GEMET) describing the relevant spatial data theme as defined in Annex I, II or III to Directive 2007/2/EC.
The titles and definitions of all 34 INSPIRE Spatial Data Themes have now been integrated into the General Environmental Multi-lingual Thesaurus (GEMET) in the 23 official Community languages: http://www.eionet.europa.eu/gemet/inspire_themes.
Note that, in addition to the INSPIRE Spatial Data Theme, also other keywords might be added. These may be described as a free text or may originate from any Controlled Vocabulary. If they originate from a Controlled Vocabulary (Thesaurus, Ontology), the citation of the originating Controlled Vocabulary shall be provided, as described below.

The requirement for geographic location referred to in Article 11(2)(e) of Directive 2007/2/EC shall be expressed with the metadata element geographic bounding box. This is the extent of the resource in the geographic space, given as a bounding box. The bounding box shall be expressed with westbound and eastbound longitudes, and southbound and northbound latitudes in decimal degrees, with a precision of at least 2 decimals.

This metadata element addresses the requirement to have information on the temporal dimension of the data as referred to in Article 8(2)(d) of Directive 2007/2/EC . At least one of the metadata elements referred to in points 5.1 to 5.4 shall be provided. The value domain of the metadata elements referred to in points 5.1 to 5.4 is a set of dates. Each date shall refer to a temporal reference system and shall be expressed in a form compatible with that system. The default reference system shall be the Gregorian calendar, with dates expressed in accordance with ISO 8601.
The temporal extent defines the time period covered by the content of the resource.
This time period may be expressed as any of the following:
an individual date
an interval of dates expressed through the starting date and end date of the interval
a mix of individual dates and intervals of dates

The requirements referred to in Article 5(2) and Article 11(2) of Directive 2007/2/EC relating to the quality and validity of spatial data shall be addressed by the following metadata elements:
Lineage: This is a statement on process history and/or overall quality of the spatial data set. Where appropriate it may include a statement whether the data set has been validated or quality assured, whether it is the official version (if multiple versions exist), and whether it has legal validity. The value domain of this metadata element is free text.
Spatial resolution:
Spatial resolution refers to the level of detail of the data set. It shall be expressed as a set of zero to many resolution distances (typically for gridded data and imagery-derived products) or equivalent scales (typically for maps or map-derived products). An equivalent scale is generally expressed as an integer value expressing the scale denominator. A resolution distance shall be expressed as a numerical value associated with a unit of length.

The requirements referred to in Article 5(2)(a) and Article 11(2)(d) of Directive 2007/2/EC relating to the conformity, and the degree of conformity, with implementing rules adopted under Article 7(1) of Directive 2007/2/EC shall be addressed by the following metadata elements:
Specification: This is a citation of the implementing rules adopted under Article 7(1) of Directive 2007/2/EC or other specification to which a particular resource conforms. A resource may conform to more than one implementing rules adopted under Article 7(1) of Directive 2007/2/EC or other specification. This citation shall include at least the title and a reference date (date of publication, date of last revision or of creation) of the implementing rules adopted under Article 7(1) of Directive 2007/2/EC or of the specification.
Degree: This is the degree of conformity of the resource to the implementing rules adopted under Article 7(1) of Directive 2007/2/EC or other specification. The value domain of this metadata element is defined in Part D.

constraint.title: Constraint related to access and use

help.div:
A constraint related to access and use shall be either or both of the following:
Conditions applying to access and use: This metadata element defines the conditions for access and use of spatial data sets and services, and where applicable, corresponding fees as required by Article 5(2)(b) and Article 11(2)(f) of Directive 2007/2/EC. The value domain of this metadata element is free text. The element must have values.
If no conditions apply to the access and use of the resource, "no conditions apply" shall be used. If conditions are unknown, "conditions unknown" shall be used. This element shall also provide information on any fees necessary to access and use the resource, if applicable, or refer to a Uniform Resource Locator (URL) where information on fees is available.
Limitations on public access: When Member States limit public access to spatial data sets and spatial data services under Article 13 of Directive 2007/2/EC, this metadata element shall provide information on the limitations and the reasons for them. If there are no limitations on public access, this metadata element shall indicate that fact. The value domain of this metadata element is free text.

org.title: Organisations responsible for the establishment, management, maintenance and distribution

help.div:
For the purposes of Article 5(2)(d) and Article 11(2)(g) of Directive 2007/2/EC, the following two metadata elements shall be provided:
Responsible party: This is the description of the organisation responsible for the establishment, management, maintenance and distribution of the resource. This description shall include: (the name of the organisation as free text, a contact e-mail address as a character string.)
Responsible party role: This is the role of the responsible organisation. The value domain of this metadata element is defined in Part D.6.

mainpage2.p: GeoNetwork opensource allows to easily share geographically referenced thematic information between different organizations. For more information please contact

p.font:
You can search using one of the provided options, or a combination of them.
Only results matching all criteria will be displayed.

The What? search searches for matching text in all metadata fields in GeoNetwork's content.
When entering more than one word in the Free text textbox, they will be interpreted by the system as separated by AND.
The Topic search will find maps matching a specific topic.
The Where? search will find maps matching the bounding box of the selected area.

Selecting the option "
Including
the selected Area " will find maps that cover more than just the selected area.
For example: Regional or Global maps that, among other countries, also cover the selected country

Selecting the option "
Partially overlapping
the selected Area " will also find maps that partially cover the selected area.

element.name: citRespParty
element.label: Cited responsible party
element.description: name and position information for an individual or organization that is responsible for the resource

element.name: city
element.label: City
element.description: city of the location

element.name: class
element.label: Class
element.description: name of the handling restrictions on the resource

element.name: classSys
element.label: Classification system
element.description: name of the classification system

element.name: cloudCovPer
element.label: Cloud cover percentage
element.description: area of the dataset obscured by clouds, expressed as a percentage of the spatial extent

element.name: cmpGenQuan
element.label: Compression generation quantity
element.description: count of the number the number of lossy compression cycles performed on the image

element.name: cntAddress
element.label: Address
element.description: physical and email address at which the organization or individual may be contacted

element.name: cntHours
element.label: Hours of service
element.description: time period (including time zone) when individuals can contact the organization or individual

element.name: cntInstr
element.label: Contact instructions
element.description: supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the individual or organization

element.name: cntPhone
element.label: Phone
element.description: telephone numbers at which the organization or individual may be contacted

element.name: collTitle
element.label: Collective title
element.description: common title with holdings note. NOTE title identifies elements of a series collectively, combined with information about what volumes are available at the source cited

element.name: compCode
element.label: Compliance code
element.description: indication of whether or not the cited feature catalogue complies with ISO 19110

element.name: conExpl
element.label: Explanation
element.description: explanation of the meaning of conformance for this result

element.name: conPass
element.label: Pass
element.description: indication of the conformance result where 0 = fail and 1 = pass

element.name: ConResult
element.label: Conformance result
element.description: Information about the outcome of evaluating the obtained value (or set of values) against a specified acceptable conformance quality level

element.name: conSpec
element.label: Specification
element.description: citation of product specification or user requirement against which data is being evaluated

element.name: Consts
element.label: Constraints
element.description: restrictions on the access and use of a resource or metadata

element.name: contentTyp
element.label: Content type
element.description: type of information represented by the cell value

element.name: ContInfo
element.label: Content information
element.description: description of the content of a dataset

element.name: contInfo
element.label: Content info
element.description: provides information about the feature catalogue and describes the coverage and image data characteristics

element.name: cornerPts
element.label: Corner points
element.description: earth location in the coordinate system defined by the Spatial Reference System and the grid coordinate of the cells at opposite ends of grid coverage along two diagonals in the grid spatial dimensions. There are four corner points in a georectified grid; at least two corner points along one diagonal are required

element.name: country
element.label: Country
element.description: country of the physical address

element.name: CovDesc
element.label: Coverage description
element.description: information about the content of a grid data cell

element.name: covDim
element.label: Dimension
element.description: information on the dimensions of the cell measurement value

element.name: ctrlPtAv
element.label: Control point availability
element.description: indication of whether or not control point(s) exists

element.name: dataChar
element.label: Character set
element.description: full name of the character coding standard used for the dataset

element.name: dataExt
element.label: Extent
element.description: additional extent information including the bounding polygon, vertical, and temporal extent of the dataset

element.name: DataIdent
element.label: Data identification
element.description: information required to identify a dataset

element.name: dataIdInfo
element.label: Identification info
element.description: basic information about the resource(s) to which the metadata applies

element.name: dataLang
element.label: Language
element.description: language(s) used within the dataset

element.name: dataLineage
element.label: Lineage
element.description: non-quantitative quality information about the lineage of the data specified by the scope

element.name: DataQual
element.label: Data quality
element.description: quality information for the data specified by a data quality scope

element.name: dataScale
element.label: Spatial resolution
element.description: factor which provides a general understanding of the density of spatial data in the dataset

element.name: datasetSeries
element.label: Series
element.description: information about the series, or aggregate dataset, of which the dataset is a part

element.name: DatasetSeries
element.label: Series
element.description: information about the series, or aggregate dataset, to which a dataset belongs

element.name: datasetSet
element.label: Dataset Set
element.description: dataset to which the information applies

element.name: dataSource
element.label: Source
element.description: information about the source data used in creating the data specified by the scope

element.name: dateNext
element.label: Date of next update
element.description: scheduled revision date for resource (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: DateRef
element.label: Date
element.description: reference date and event used to describe it (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: datum
element.label: Datum
element.description: Identity of the datum used

element.name: delPoint
element.label: Delivery point
element.description: address line for the location (as described in ISO 11180, annex A)

element.name: denFlatRat
element.label: Denominator of flattening ratio
element.description: ratio of the difference between the equatorial and polar radii of the ellipsoid to the equatorial radius when the numerator is set to 1

element.name: descKeys
element.label: Descriptive keywords
element.description: provides category keywords, their type, and reference source

element.name: DigTranOps

element.description: technical means and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor

element.name: dimDescrp
element.label: Descriptor
element.description: description of the range of a cell measurement value

element.name: Dimen
element.label: Dimension
element.description: axis properties

element.name: dimName
element.label: Dimension name
element.description: name of the axis

element.name: dimResol
element.label: Resolution
element.description: degree of detail in the grid dataset

element.name: dimSize
element.label: Dimension size
element.description: number of elements along the axis

element.name: distInfo
element.label: Distribution info
element.description: provides information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource(s)

element.name: distorCont
element.label: Distributor contact
element.description: party from whom the resource may be obtained. This list need not be exhaustive

element.name: distorFormat
element.label: Distributor format
element.description: provides information about the format used by the distributor

element.name: distorOrdPrc
element.label: Distribution order process
element.description: provides information about how the resource may be obtained, and related instructions and fee information

element.name: Distrib
element.label: Distribution
element.description: information about the distributor of and options for obtaining the resource

element.name: Distributor
element.label: Distributor
element.description: information about the distributor

element.name: distributor
element.label: Distributor
element.description: provides information about the distributor

element.name: distTranOps
element.label: Transfer options
element.description: provides information about technical means and media by which a resource is obtained from the distributor

element.name: DQAbsExtPosAcc
element.label: Absolute external positional accuracy
element.description: closeness of reported coordinate values to values accepted as or being true

element.name: DQAccTimeMeas
element.label: Accuracy of time measurement
element.description: correctness of the temporal references of an item (reporting of error in time measurement)

element.name: DQCompComm
element.label: Completeness commission
element.description: excess data present in the dataset, as described by the scope

element.name: DQCompOm
element.label: Completeness omission
element.description: data absent from the dataset, as described by the scope

element.name: DQConcConsis
element.label: Conceptual consistency
element.description: adherence to rules of the conceptual schema

element.name: DQDomConsis
element.label: Domain consistency
element.description: adherence of values to the value domains

element.name: DQFormConsis
element.label: Format consistency
element.description: degree to which data is stored in accordance with the physical structure of the dataset, as described by the scope

element.name: DQGridDataPosAcc
element.label: Gridded data positional accuracy
element.description: closeness of gridded data position values to values accepted as or being true

element.name: dqInfo
element.label: Data quality info
element.description: provides overall assessment of quality of a resource(s)

element.name: DQNonQuanAttAcc
element.label: Non quantitative attribute accuracy
element.description: correctness of non-quantitative attributes

element.name: DQQuanAttAcc
element.label: Quantitative attribute accuracy
element.description: accuracy of quantitative attributes

element.name: DQRelIntPosAcc
element.label: Relative internal positional accuracy
element.description: closeness of the relative positions of features in the scope to their respective relative positions accepted as or being true

element.name: dqReport
element.label: Report
element.description: quantitative quality information for the data specified by the scope

element.name: DQScope
element.label: Scope
element.description: description of the data specified by the scope

element.name: dqScope
element.label: Scope
element.description: the specific data to which the data quality information applies

element.name: DQTempConsis
element.label: Temporal consistency
element.description: correctness of ordered events or sequences, if reported

element.name: DQTempValid
element.label: Temporal validity
element.description: validity of data specified by the scope with respect to time

element.name: DQThemClassCor
element.label: Thematic classification correctness
element.description: comparison of the classes assigned to features or their attributes to a universe of discourse

element.name: DQTopConsis
element.label: Topological consistency
element.description: correctness of the explicitly encoded topological characteristics of the dataset as described by the scope

element.name: dsFormat
element.label: Resource format
element.description: provides a description of the format of the resource(s)

element.name: eastBL
element.label: East bound longitude
element.description: eastern-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: ellipsoid
element.label: Ellipsoid
element.description: identity of the ellipsoid used

element.name: ellParas
element.label: Ellipsoid parameters
element.description: set of parameters that describe the ellipsoid

element.name: EllParas
element.label: Ellipsoid parameters
element.description: set of parameters that describe the ellipsoid

element.name: eMailAdd
element.label: Electronic mail address
element.description: address of the electronic mailbox of the responsible organization or individual

element.name: end
element.label: End date
element.description: ending date of the validity period

element.name: envirDesc
element.label: Environment description
element.description: description of the dataset in the producer_s processing environment, including items such as the software, the computer operating system, file name, and the dataset size

element.name: equScale
element.label: Equivalent scale
element.description: level of detail expressed as the scale of a comparable hardcopy map or chart

element.name: errStat

element.name: evalMethDesc
element.label: Evaluation method description
element.description: description of the evaluation method

element.name: evalMethType

element.description: type of method used to evaluate quality of the dataset

element.name: exDesc
element.label: Description
element.description: spatial and temporal extent for the referring object

element.name: exSpat
element.label: Spatial extent
element.description: spatial extent component of composite spatial and temporal extent

element.name: extEleCond
element.label: Condition
element.description: condition under which the extended element is mandatory

element.name: extEleDef
element.label: Definition
element.description: definition of the extended element

element.name: extEleDomVal
element.label: Domain value
element.description: valid values that can be assigned to the extended element

element.description: new metadata element, not found in ISO 19115, which is required to describe geographic data

element.name: extEleMxOc
element.label: Maximum occurrence
element.description: maximum occurrence of the extended element

element.name: extEleName
element.label: Name
element.description: name of the extended metadata element.

element.name: extEleOb
element.label: Obligation
element.description: obligation of the extended element

element.name: extEleParEnt
element.label: Parent entity
element.description: name of the metadata entity(s) under which this extended metadata element may appear. The name(s) may be standard metadata element(s) or other extended metadata element(s).

element.name: extEleRat
element.label: Rationale
element.description: reason for creating the extended element

element.name: extEleRule
element.label: Rule
element.description: specifies how the extended element relates to other existing elements and entities

element.name: extEleSrc
element.label: Source
element.description: name of the person or organization creating the extended element

element.name: exTemp
element.label: Extent
element.description: date and time for the content of the dataset

element.name: Extent
element.label: Extent
element.description: information about spatial, vertical, and temporal extent

element.name: extOnRes
element.label: Extension Online resource
element.description: information about on-line sources containing the community profile name and the extended metadata elements. Information for all new metadata elements

element.name: extShortName

element.description: short form suitable for use in an implementation method such as XML or SGML. NOTE other methods may be used

element.name: exTypeCode
element.label: Extent type code
element.description: indication of whether the bounding polygon encompasses an area covered by the data or an area where data is not present

element.name: falEastng
element.label: False easting
element.description: value added to all _x_ values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection. This value frequently is assigned to eliminate negative numbers. Expressed in the unit of measure identified in Planar Coordinate Units

element.name: falENUnits
element.label: False easting northing units
element.description: units of false northing and false easting

element.name: falNorthng
element.label: False northing
element.description: value added to all _y_ values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection. This value frequently is assigned to eliminate negative numbers. Expressed in the unit of measure identified in Planar Coordinate Units

element.name: faxNum
element.label: Facsimile
element.description: telephone number of a facsimile machine for the responsible organization or individual

element.name: featIntSet
element.label: Feature instances
element.description: feature instances to which the information applies

element.name: featSet
element.label: Features
element.description: features to which the information applies

element.name: featTypeList
element.label: The feature type list
element.description: provides information about the list of feature types with the same spatial representation

element.name: FeatTypList
element.label: Feature type list
element.description: list of names of feature types with the same spatial representation (same as spatial attributes)

element.name: FetCatDesc
element.label: Feature catalogue description
element.description: information identifying the feature catalogue

element.name: fileDecmTech

element.description: recommendations of algorithms or processes that can be applied to read or expand resources to which compression techniques have been applied

element.name: filmDistInAv

element.description: indication of whether or not Calibration Reseau information is available

element.name: formatAmdNum
element.label: Amendment number
element.description: amendment number of the format version

element.name: formatName
element.label: Name
element.description: name of the data transfer format(s)

element.name: formatSpec
element.label: Specification
element.description: name of a subset, profile, or product specification of the format

element.name: formatVer
element.label: Version
element.description: version of the format (date, number, etc.)

element.name: GeoBndBox
element.label: Geographic bounding box
element.description: geographic position of the dataset

element.name: geoBox
element.label: Geographic box
element.description: minimum bounding rectangle within which data is available

element.name: geoDesc
element.label: Geographic description
element.description: description of the geographic area within which data is available

element.name: GeoDesc
element.label: Geographic description
element.description: Description of the geographic area using identifiers

element.name: geoEle
element.label: Geographic element
element.description: provides geographic component of the extent of the referring object

element.name: geoId
element.label: Geographic identifier
element.description: identifier used to represent a geographic area

element.name: geometObjs
element.label: Geometric objects
element.description: information about the geometric objects used in the dataset

element.name: GeometObjs

element.description: number of objects, listed by geometric object type, used in the dataset

element.name: geoObjCnt
element.label: Geometric object count
element.description: total number of the point or vector object type occurring in the dataset

element.name: geoObjTyp
element.label: Geometric object type
element.description: name of point and vector spatial objects used to locate zero-, one-, and two-dimensional spatial locations in the dataset

element.name: Georect
element.label: Georectified
element.description: grid whose cells are regularly spaced in a geographic (i.e., lat / long) or map coordinate system defined in the Spatial Referencing System (SRS) so that any cell in the grid can be geolocated given its grid coordinate and the grid origin, cell spacing, and orientation

element.name: Georef
element.label: Georeferenceable
element.description: grid with cells irregularly spaced in any given geographic/map projection coordinate system, whose individual cells can be geolocated using geolocation information supplied with the data but cannot be geolocated from the grid properties alone

element.name: georefPars
element.label: Georeferenced parameters
element.description: terms which support grid data georeferencing

element.name: graphOver
element.label: Graphic overview
element.description: provides a graphic that illustrates the resource(s) (should include a legend for the graphic)

element.name: GridSpatRep
element.label: Grid spatial representation
element.description: information about grid spatial objects in the dataset

element.name: handDesc
element.label: Handling description
element.description: additional information about the restrictions on handling the resource

element.name: hgtProsPt
element.label: Height of prospective point above surface
element.description: height of viewpoint above the Earth, expressed in metres

element.name: idAbs
element.label: Abstract
element.description: brief narrative summary of the content of the resource(s)

element.name: idCitation
element.label: Citation
element.description: citation data for the resource(s)

element.name: idCredit
element.label: Credit
element.description: recognition of those who contributed to the resource(s)

element.name: identAuth
element.label: Authority

element.name: identCode
element.label: Code
element.description: alphanumeric value identifying an instance in the namespace

element.name: idPoC

element.name: idPurp

element.name: idSpecUse

element.description: provides basic information about specific application(s) for which the resource(s) has/have been or is being used by different users

element.name: illAziAng

element.description: illumination azimuth measured in degrees clockwise from true north at the time the image is taken. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image

element.name: illElevAng
element.label: Illumination elevation angle
element.description: illumination elevation measured in degrees clockwise from the target plane at intersection of the optical line of sight with the Earth_s surface. For images from a scanning device, refer to the centre pixel of the image

element.name: imagCond
element.label: Imaging condition
element.description: conditions affected the image

element.name: imagQuCode

element.name: ImgDesc

element.description: information about an image_s suitability for use

element.name: incWithDS

element.name: isbn

element.name: issId
element.label: Issue identification
element.description: information identifying the issue of the series

element.name: issn

element.name: keyTyp

element.name: Keywords

element.name: longCntMer

element.name: longProjCnt

element.name: mdConst

element.name: mdContact

element.name: mdExtInfo

element.name: MdExtInfo
element.label: Metadata extension info
element.description: information describing metadata extensions

element.name: mdFileID
element.label: File identifier

element.name: mdHrLv

element.name: mdHrLvName

element.name: MdIdent

element.name: mdLang
element.label: Language

element.name: mdMaint

element.description: provides information about the frequency of metadata updates, and the scope of those updates

element.name: mdParentID

element.name: mdStanName
element.label: Metadata standard name

element.name: mdStanVer
element.label: Metadata standard version

element.name: measDateTm

element.name: measId

element.name: offset

element.name: OnlineRes

element.name: onLineSrc

element.name: orDesc

element.name: ordInstr

element.name: ordTurn

element.name: orieParaAv

element.name: orName

element.name: othConsts

element.name: PortCatRef

element.name: postCode

element.name: PrcessStep

element.name: prcStep

element.description: information about an event in the creation process for the data specified by the scope

element.name: prcTypCde

element.name: presForm

element.name: projection

element.name: projParas

element.description: set of parameters that describe the projection

element.name: ProjParas

element.description: set of parameters that describe the projection

element.name: protocol

element.description: connection protocol to be used

element.name: ptInPixel
element.label: PointIn pixel
element.description: point in a pixel corresponding to the Earth location of the pixel

element.name: QuanResult
element.label: Quantitative result

element.name: quanValType
element.label: Value type
element.description: value type for reporting a data quality result

element.name: quanValUnit
element.label: Value unit
element.description: value unit for reporting a data quality result

element.name: radCalDatAv
element.label: Radiometric calibration data availability
element.description: indication of whether or not the radiometric calibration information for generating the radiometrically calibrated standard data product is available

element.name: RangeDim
element.label: Range dimension
element.description: information on the range of each dimension of a cell measurement value

element.name: refDate
element.label: Date
element.description: reference date for the cited resource (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: refDateType
element.label: Date type
element.description: event used for reference date

element.name: refSysID
element.label: Reference system identifier
element.description: name of reference system

element.name: refSysInfo
element.label: Reference system info
element.description: description of the spatial and temporal reference systems used in the dataset

element.name: RefSystem
element.label: Reference system
element.description: information about the reference system.

element.name: RepFract
element.label: Representative fraction
element.description: derived from Scale where MD_RepresentativeFraction.denominator = 1 / Scale.measure And Scale.targetUnits = Scale.sourceUnits

element.name: resAltTitle
element.label: Alternate title
element.description: short name or other language name by which the cited information is known. Example: "DCW" as an alternative title for "Digital Chart of the World

element.name: resConst
element.label: Resource constraints
element.description: provides information about constraints which apply to the resource(s)

element.name: resEd
element.label: Edition
element.description: version of the cited resource

element.name: resEdDate
element.label: Edition date
element.description: date of the edition (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: resFees
element.label: Fees
element.description: fees and terms for retrieving the resource. Include monetary units (as specified in ISO 4217)

element.name: resMaint
element.label: Resource maintenance
element.description: provides information about the frequency of resource updates, and the scope of those updates

element.name: Resol
element.label: Resolution
element.description: level of detail expressed as a scale factor or a ground distance

element.name: RespParty
element.label: Responsible party
element.description: identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organizations associated with the dataset

element.name: resRefDate
element.label: Date
element.description: reference date for the cited resource (YYYY-MM-DD)

element.name: resTitle
element.label: Title
element.description: name by which the cited resource is known

element.name: Result
element.label: Result
element.description: generalization of more specific result classes

element.name: rfDenom
element.label: Denominator
element.description: the number below the line in a vulgar fraction

element.name: role
element.label: Role
element.description: function performed by the responsible party

element.name: rpCntInfo
element.label: Contact info
element.description: address of the responsible party

element.name: rpIndName

element.name: rpOrgName

element.name: rpPosName

element.name: scaleDist

element.description: ground sample distance

element.name: sclFac

element.name: sclFacCnt

element.name: sclFacEqu

element.name: sclFacPrOr

element.name: ScpDesc

element.name: scpLvlDesc
element.label: Level description

element.name: SecConsts
element.label: Security constraints
element.description: handling restrictions imposed on the resource for national security or similar security concerns

element.name: semiMajAx

element.name: seqID
element.label: Sequence identifier

element.name: seriesName
element.label: Name
element.description: name of the series, or aggregate dataset, of which the dataset is a part

element.name: Source
element.label: Source
element.description: information about the source data used in creating the data specified by the scope

element.name: southBL
element.label: South bound latitude
element.description: southern-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in latitude in decimal degrees (positive north)

element.name: SpatAttSup
element.label: Spatial attribute supplement
element.description: spatial attributes in the application schema for the feature types

element.name: spatObj
element.label: Spatial object
element.description: instance of a type defined in the spatial schema

element.name: spatRepInfo
element.label: Spatial representation info
element.description: digital representation of spatial information in the dataset

element.name: spatRpType
element.label: Spatial representation type
element.description: method used to spatially represent geographic information

element.name: spatSchName
element.label: Spatial schema name
element.description: name of the spatial schema used

element.name: SpatTempEx
element.label: Spatial temporal extent
element.description: extent with respect to date/time and spatial boundaries

element.name: specUsage
element.label: Specific usage
element.description: brief description of the resource and/or resource series usage

element.name: srcCitatn
element.label: Source citation
element.description: recommended reference to be used for the source data

element.name: srcDesc
element.label: Description
element.description: detailed description of the level of the source data

element.name: srcExt
element.label: Source extent
element.description: information about the spatial, vertical and temporal extent of the source data

element.name: srcRefSys
element.label: Source reference system
element.description: spatial reference system used by the source data

element.name: srcScale
element.label: Scale
element.description: denominator of the representative fraction on a source map

element.name: srcStep
element.label: Source step
element.description: information about an event in the creation process for the source data

element.name: StanOrdProc
element.label: Standard order process
element.description: common ways in which the resource may be obtained or received, and related instructions and fee information

element.name: statement
element.label: Statement
element.description: general explanation of the data producer_s knowledge about the lineage of a dataset

element.name: status
element.label: Status
element.description: status of the resource(s)

element.name: stepDateTm
element.label: Date time
element.description: date and time or range of date and time on or over which the process step occurred (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

element.name: stepDesc
element.label: Description
element.description: description of the event, including related parameters or tolerances

element.name: stepProc
element.label: Processor
element.description: identification of, and means of communication with, person(s) and organization(s) associated with the process step

element.name: stepRat
element.label: Rationale
element.description: requirement or purpose for the process step

element.name: stepSrc
element.label: Source
element.description: information about the source data used in creating the data specified by the scope

element.name: stVrLongPl
element.label: Straight vertical longitude from pole
element.description: longitude to be oriented straight up from the North or South Pole

element.name: suppInfo
element.label: Supplemental Information
element.description: any other descriptive information about the dataset

element.name: Telephone
element.label: Telephone
element.description: telephone numbers for contacting the responsible individual or organization

element.name: tempEle
element.label: Temporal element
element.description: provides temporal component of the extent of the referring object

element.name: TempExtent
element.label: Temporal Extent
element.description: time period covered by the content of the dataset

element.name: thesaName
element.label: Thesaurus name
element.description: name of the formally registered thesaurus or a similar authoritative source of keywords

element.name: toneGrad
element.label: Tone gradation
element.description: number of discrete numerical values in the grid data

element.name: topLvl
element.label: Topology level
element.description: code which identifies the degree of complexity of the spatial relationships

element.name: tpCat
element.label: Topic category
element.description: main theme(s) of the datset

element.name: tranParaAv
element.label: Transformation parameter availability
element.description: indication of whether or not parameters for transformation exists

element.name: transDimDesc
element.label: Transformation dimension description
element.description: description of the information about which grid dimensions are the spatial dimensions

element.name: transDimMap
element.label: Transformation dimension mapping
element.description: information about which grid dimensions are the spatial dimensions

element.name: transSize
element.label: Transfer size
element.description: estimated size of a unit in the specified transfer format, expressed in megabytes. The transfer size is > 0.0

element.name: trianInd

element.description: indication of whether or not triangulation has been performed upon the image

element.name: unitsODist
element.label: Units of distribution
element.description: tiles, layers, geographic areas, etc., in which data is available

element.name: upScpDesc
element.label: Update scope description
element.description: additional information about the range or extent of the resource

element.name: Usage
element.label: Usage
element.description: brief description of ways in which the resource(s) is/are currently used

element.name: usageDate
element.label: Usage datetime
element.description: date and time of the first use or range of uses of the resource and/or resource series (YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss)

element.name: useConsts
element.label: Use constraints
element.description: constraints applied to assure the protection of privacy or intellectual property, and any special restrictions or limitations or warnings on using the resource

element.name: useLimit
element.label: Use limitation
element.description: limitation affecting the fitness for use of the resource. Example, _not to be used for navigation_

element.name: userNote
element.label: User note
element.description: explanation of the application of the legal constraints or other restrictions and legal prerequisites for obtaining and using the resource

element.name: usrCntInfo
element.label: User contact info
element.description: identification of and means of communicating with person(s) and organization(s) using the resource(s)

element.name: usrDefFreq
element.label: User defined maintenance frequency
element.description: maintenance period other than those defined

element.name: usrDetLim
element.label: User determined limitations
element.description: applications, determined by the user for which the resource and/or resource series is not suitable

element.name: valUnit
element.label: Value unit
element.description: units in which sensor wavelengths are expressed

element.name: VectSpatRep
element.label: Vector spatial representation
element.description: information about the vector spatial objects in the dataset

element.name: vertDatum

element.name: vertEle
element.label: Vertical element
element.description: provides vertical component of the extent of the referring object

element.name: VertExtent
element.label: Vertical extent
element.description: vertical domain of dataset

element.name: vertMaxVal
element.label: Maximum value
element.description: highest vertical extent contained in the dataset

element.name: vertMinVal
element.label: Minimum value
element.description: lowest vertical extent contained in the dataset

element.name: vertUoM
element.label: Vertical Unit of measure
element.description: vertical units used for vertical extent information. Examples: metres, feet, millimetres, hectopascals

element.name: voiceNum
element.label: Voice
element.description: telephone number by which individuals can speak to the responsible organization or individual

element.name: westBL
element.label: West bound longitude
element.description: western-most coordinate of the limit of the dataset extent, expressed in longitude in decimal degrees (positive east)

element.name: zone
element.label: Zone
element.description: unique identifier for 100,000 metre grid zone

entry.label: Creation
entry.description: date identifies when the resource was brought into existence

entry.label: Publication
entry.description: date identifies when the resource was issued

entry.label: Revision
entry.description: date identifies when the resource was examined or re-examined and improved or amended

entry.label: Download
entry.description: online instructions for transferring data from one storage device or system to another

entry.label: Information
entry.description: online information about the resource

entry.label: Offline Access
entry.description: online instructions for requesting the resource from the provider

entry.label: Order
entry.description: online order process for obtaining the resource

entry.label: Search
entry.description: online search interface for seeking out information about the resource

entry.label: Document Digital
entry.description: digital representation of a primarily textual item (can contain illustrations also)

entry.label: Document Hardcopy
entry.description: representation of a primarily textual item (can contain illustrations also) on paper, photographic material, or other media

entry.label: Image Digital
entry.description: likeness of natural or man-made features, objects, and activities acquired through the sensing of visual or any other segment of the electromagnetic spectrum by sensors, such as thermal infrared, and high resolution radar and stored in digital format

entry.label: Image Hardcopy
entry.description: likeness of natural or man-made features, objects, and activities acquired through the sensing of visual or any other segment of the electromagnetic spectrum by sensors, such as thermal infrared, and high resolution radar and reproduced on paper, photographic material, or other media for use directly by the human user

entry.label: Map Digital
entry.description: map represented in raster or vector form

entry.label: Map Hardcopy
entry.description: map printed on paper, photographic material, or other media for use directly by the human user

entry.label: Model Digital
entry.description: multi-dimensional digital representation of a feature, process, etc.

entry.label: Model Hardcopy
entry.description: 3-dimensional, physical model

entry.label: Profile Digital
entry.description: vertical cross-section in digital form

entry.label: Profile Hardcopy
entry.description: vertical cross-section printed on paper, etc.

entry.label: Table Digital
entry.description: digital representation of facts or figures systematically displayed, especially in columns

entry.label: Table Hardcopy
entry.description: representation of facts or figures systematically displayed, especially in columns, printed on paper, photographic material, or other media

entry.label: Video Digital
entry.description: digital video recording

entry.label: Video Hardcopy
entry.description: video recording on film

entry.label: Resource Provider
entry.description: party that supplies the resource

entry.label: Custodian
entry.description: party that accepts accountability and responsibility for the data and ensures appropriate care and maintenance of the resource

entry.label: Owner
entry.description: party that owns the resource

entry.label: User
entry.description: party who uses the resource

entry.label: Distributor
entry.description: party who distributes the resource

entry.label: Originator
entry.description: party who created the resource

entry.label: Point Of Contact
entry.description: party who can be contacted for acquiring knowledge about or acquisition of the resource

entry.label: Principal Investigator
entry.description: key party responsible for gathering information and conducting research.

entry.label: Processor
entry.description: party who has processed the data in a manner such that the resource has been modified

entry.label: Publisher
entry.description: party who published the resource

entry.label: Direct Internal
entry.description: method of evaluating the quality of a dataset based on inspection of items within the dataset, where all data required is internal to the dataset being evaluated

entry.label: Direct External
entry.description: method of evaluating the quality of a dataset based on inspection of items within the dataset, where reference data external to the dataset being evaluated is required

entry.label: Indirect
entry.description: method of evaluating the quality of a dataset based on external knowledge

entry.label: Cross Reference
entry.description: reference from one dataset to another

entry.label: Larger Work Citation
entry.description: reference to a master dataset of which this one is a part

entry.label: Part Of Seamless Database
entry.description: part of same structured set of data held in a computer

entry.label: Source
entry.description: mapping and charting information from which the dataset content originates

entry.label: Stereomate
entry.description: part of a set of imagery that when used together, provides three-dimensional images

entry.label: Campaign
entry.description: series of organized planned actions

entry.label: Collection
entry.description: accumulation of datasets assembled for a specific purpose

entry.label: Exercise
entry.description: specific performance of a function or group of functions

entry.label: Experiment
entry.description: process designed to find if something is effective or valid

entry.label: Investigation
entry.description: search or systematic inquiry

entry.label: Mission
entry.description: specific operation of a data collection system

entry.label: Non Image Sensor
entry.description: device or piece of equipment which detects or records

entry.label: Operation
entry.description: action that is part of a series of actions

entry.label: Platform
entry.description: vehicle or other support base that holds a sensor

entry.label: Process
entry.description: method of doing something involving a number of steps

entry.label: Program
entry.description: specific planned activity

entry.label: Project
entry.description: organized undertaking, research, or development

entry.label: Study
entry.description: examination or investigation

entry.label: Task
entry.description: piece of work

entry.label: Trial
entry.description: process of testing to discover or demonstrate something

entry.label: Point
entry.description: each cell represents a point

entry.label: Area
entry.description: each cell represents an area

entry.label: Ucs2
entry.description: 16-bit fixed size Universal Character Set, based on ISO 10646

entry.label: Ucs4
entry.description: 32-bit fixed size Universal Character Set, based on ISO 10646

entry.label: Utf7
entry.description: 7-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO 10646

entry.label: Utf8
entry.description: 8-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO 10646

entry.label: Utf16
entry.description: 16-bit variable size UCS Transfer Format, based on ISO 10646

entry.label: 8859 part 1
entry.description: latin-1, west European code set

entry.label: 8859 part 2
entry.description: latin-2, central European code set

entry.label: 8859 part 3
entry.description: latin-3, south European code set

entry.label: 8859 part 4
entry.description: latin-4, north European code set

entry.label: 8859 part 5
entry.description: cyrillic code set

entry.label: 8859 part 6
entry.description: arabic code set

entry.label: 8859 part 7
entry.description: greek code set

entry.label: 8859 part 8
entry.description: hebrew code set

entry.label: 8859 part 9
entry.description: latin-5, Turkish code set

entry.label: 8859 part 11
entry.description: thai code set

entry.label: 8859 part 14
entry.description: latin-8 code set

entry.label: 8859 part 15
entry.description: latin-9 code set

entry.label: Jis
entry.description: japanese code set used for electronic transmission

entry.label: ShiftJIS
entry.description: japanese code set used on MS-DOS based machines

entry.label: EucJP
entry.description: japanese code set used on UNIX based machines

entry.label: UsAscii
entry.description: united states ASCII code set (ISO 646 US)

entry.label: Ebcdic
entry.description: ibm mainframe code set

entry.label: EucKR
entry.description: korean code set

entry.label: Big5
entry.description: taiwanese code set

entry.label: Unclassified
entry.description: available for general disclosure

entry.label: Restricted
entry.description: not for general disclosure

entry.label: Confidential
entry.description: available for someone who can be entrusted with information

entry.label: Secret
entry.description: kept or meant to be kept private, unknown, or hidden from all but a select group of people

entry.label: Topsecret
entry.description: of the highest secrecy

entry.label: Image
entry.description: meaningful numerical representation of a physical parameter that is not the actual value of the physical parameter

entry.label: Thematic Classification
entry.description: code value with no quantitative meaning, used to represent a physical quantity

entry.label: Physical Measurement
entry.description: value in physical units of the quantity being measured

entry.label: Class
entry.description: descriptor of a set of objects that share the same attributes, operations, methods, relationships, and behavior

entry.label: Codelist
entry.description: flexible enumeration useful for expressing a long list of values, can be extended

entry.label: Enumeration
entry.description: data type whose instances form a list of named literal values, not extendable

entry.label: Codelist Element
entry.description: permissible value for a codelist or enumeration

entry.label: Abstract Class
entry.description: class that cannot be directly instantiated

entry.label: Aggregate Class
entry.description: class that is composed of classes it is connected to by an aggregate relationship

entry.label: Specified Class
entry.description: subclass that may be substituted for its superclass

entry.label: Datatype Class
entry.description: class with few or no operations whose primary purpose is to hold the abstract state of another class for transmittal, storage, encoding or persistent storage

entry.label: Interface Class
entry.description: named set of operations that characterize the behavior of an element

entry.label: Union Class
entry.description: class describing a selection of one of the specified types

entry.label: Metaclass
entry.description: class whose instances are classes

entry.label: Type Class
entry.description: class used for specification of a domain of instances (objects), together with the operations applicable to the objects. A type may have attributes and associations

entry.label: Character String
entry.description: free text field

entry.label: Integer
entry.description: numerical field

entry.label: Association
entry.description: semantic relationship between two classes that involves connections among their instances

entry.label: Row
entry.description: ordinate (y) axis

entry.label: Column
entry.description: abscissa (x) axis

entry.label: Vertical
entry.description: vertical (z) axis

entry.label: Track
entry.description: along the direction of motion of the scan point

entry.label: Cross Track
entry.description: perpendicular to the direction of motion of the scan point

entry.label: Line
entry.description: scan line of a sensor

entry.label: Sample
entry.description: element along a scan line

entry.label: Time
entry.description: duration

entry.label: Complexes
entry.description: set of geometric primitives such that their boundaries can be represented as a union of other primitives

entry.label: Composites
entry.description: connected set of curves, solids or surfaces

entry.label: Curve
entry.description: bounded, 1-dimensional geometric primitive, representing the continuous image of a line

entry.label: Point
entry.description: zero-dimensional geometric primitive, representing a position but not having an extent

entry.label: Solid
entry.description: bounded, connected 3-dimensional geometric primitive, representing the continuous image of a region of space

entry.label: Surface
entry.description: bounded, connected 2-dimensional geometric, representing the continuous image of a region of a plane

entry.label: Blurred Image
entry.description: portion of the image is blurred

entry.label: Cloud
entry.description: portion of the image is partially obscured by cloud cover

entry.label: Degrading Obliquity
entry.description: acute angle between the plane of the ecliptic (the plane of the Earth's orbit) and the plane of the celestial equator

entry.label: Fog
entry.description: portion of the image is partially obscured by fog

entry.label: Heavy Smoke Or Dust
entry.description: portion of the image is partially obscured by heavy smoke or dust

entry.label: Night
entry.description: image was taken at night

entry.label: Rain
entry.description: image was taken during rainfall

entry.label: Semi Darkness
entry.description: image was taken during semi-dark conditions-twilight conditions

entry.label: Shadow
entry.description: portion of the image is obscured by shadow

entry.label: Snow
entry.description: portion of the image is obscured by snow

entry.label: Terrain Masking
entry.description: the absence of collection data of a given point or area caused by the relative location of topographic features which obstruct the collection path between the collector(s) and the subject(s) of interest

entry.label: Discipline
entry.description: keyword identifies a branch of instruction or specialized learning

entry.label: Place
entry.description: keyword identifies a location

entry.label: Stratum
entry.description: keyword identifies the layer(s) of any deposited substance

entry.label: Temporal
entry.description: keyword identifies a time period related to the dataset

entry.label: Theme
entry.description: keyword identifies a particular subject or topic

entry.label: Continual
entry.description: data is repeatedly and frequently updated

entry.label: Daily
entry.description: data is updated each day

entry.label: Weekly
entry.description: data is updated on a weekly basis

entry.label: Fortnightly
entry.description: data is updated every two weeks

entry.label: Monthly
entry.description: data is updated each month

entry.label: Quarterly
entry.description: data is updated every three months

entry.label: Biannually
entry.description: data is updated twice each year

entry.label: Annually
entry.description: data is updated every year

entry.label: As Needed
entry.description: data is updated as deemed necessary

entry.label: Irregular
entry.description: data is updated in intervals that are uneven in duration

entry.label: Not Planned
entry.description: there are no plans to update the data

entry.label: Unknown
entry.description: frequency of maintenance for the data is not known

entry.label: Cpio
entry.description: CoPy In / Out (UNIX file format and command)

entry.label: Tar
entry.description: Tap ARchive

entry.label: High Sierra
entry.description: high sierra file system

entry.label: Iso9660
entry.description: information processing - volume and file structure of CD-ROM

entry.label: Iso9660 Rock Ridge
entry.description: rock ridge interchange protocol (UNIX)

entry.label: Iso9660 Apple HFS
entry.description: hierarchical file system (Macintosh)

entry.label: Cd Rom
entry.description: read-only optical disk

entry.label: Dvd
entry.description: digital versatile disk

entry.label: Dvd Rom
entry.description: digital versatile disk, read only

entry.label: 3 half Inch Floppy
entry.description: 3,5 inch magnetic disk

entry.label: 5 quarter Inch Floppy
entry.description: 5,25 inch magnetic disk

entry.label: 7 track Tape
entry.description: 7 track magnetic tape

entry.label: 9 track Tape
entry.description: 9 track magnetic tape

entry.label: 3480 Cartridge
entry.description: 3480 cartridge tape drive

entry.label: 3490 Cartridge
entry.description: 3490 cartridge tape drive

entry.label: 3580 Cartridge
entry.description: 3580 cartridge tape drive

entry.label: 4mm Cartridge Tape
entry.description: 4 millimetre magnetic tape

entry.label: 8mm Cartridge Tape
entry.description: 8 millimetre magnetic tape

entry.label: 1 quarter Inch Cartridge Tape
entry.description: 0,25 inch magnetic tape

entry.label: Digital Linear Tape
entry.description: half inch cartridge streaming tape drive

entry.label: On Line
entry.description: direct computer linkage

entry.label: Satellite
entry.description: linkage through a satellite communication system

entry.label: Telephone Link
entry.description: communication through a telephone network

entry.label: Hardcopy
entry.description: pamphlet or leaflet giving descriptive information

entry.label: Mandatory
entry.description: element is always required

entry.label: Optional
entry.description: element is not required Name Domain code Definition

entry.label: Conditional
entry.description: element is required when specific a specific condition is met

entry.label: Center
entry.description: point halfway between the lower left and the upper right of the pixel

entry.label: Lower Left
entry.description: "the corner in the pixel closest to the origin of the SRS; if two are at the same distance from the origin, the one with the smallest x-value"

entry.label: Lower Right
entry.description: next corner counterclockwise from the lower left

entry.label: Upper Right
entry.description: next corner counterclockwise from the lower right

entry.label: Upper Left
entry.description: next corner counterclockwise from the upper right

entry.label: Completed
entry.description: production of the data has been completed

entry.label: Historical Archive
entry.description: data has been stored in an offline storage facility

entry.label: Obsolete
entry.description: data is no longer relevant

entry.label: On Going
entry.description: data is continually being updated

entry.label: Planned
entry.description: fixed date has been established upon or by which the data will be created or updated

entry.label: Required
entry.description: data needs to be generated or updated

entry.label: Under development
entry.description: data is currently in the process of being created

entry.label: Copyright
entry.description: exclusive right to the publication, production, or sale of the rights to a literary, dramatic, musical, or artistic work, or to the use of a commercial print or label, granted by law for a specified period of time to an author, composer, artist, distributor

entry.label: Patent
entry.description: government has granted exclusive right to make, sell, use or license an invention or discovery

entry.label: Patent Pending
entry.description: produced or sold information awaiting a patent

entry.label: Trademark
entry.description: a name, symbol, or other device identifying a product, officially registered and legally restricted to the use of the owner or manufacturer

entry.label: License
entry.description: formal permission to do something

entry.label: Intellectual Property Rights
entry.description: rights to financial benefit from and control of distribution of non-tangible property that is a result of creativity

entry.label: Restricted
entry.description: withheld from general circulation or disclosure

entry.label: Other Restictions
entry.description: limitation not listed

entry.description: information applies to the series

entry.description: information applies to non-geographic data

entry.description: information applies to a dimension group

entry.description: information applies to a feature

entry.description: information applies to a feature type

entry.description: information applies to a field session

entry.label: Software
entry.description: information applies to a computer program or routine

entry.label: Service
entry.description: information applies to a capability which a service provider entity makes available to a service user entity through a set of interfaces that define a behaviour, such as a use case

entry.label: Model
entry.description: information applies to a copy or imitation of an existing or hypothetical object

entry.label: Vector
entry.description: vector data is used to represent geographic data

entry.label: Grid
entry.description: grid data is used to represent geographic data

entry.label: Text Table
entry.description: textual or tabular data is used to represent geographic data

entry.label: Tin
entry.description: triangulated irregular network

entry.label: Stereo Model
entry.description: three-dimensional view formed by the intersecting homologous rays of an overlapping pair of images

entry.label: Video
entry.description: scene from a video recording

entry.label: Farming
entry.description: rearing of animals and/or cultivation of plants

entry.label: Biota
entry.description: flora and/or fauna in natural environment

entry.label: Boundaries
entry.description: legal land descriptions

entry.label: Climatology Meteorology Atmosphere
entry.description: processes and phenomena of the atmosphere

entry.label: Economy
entry.description: economic activities, conditions and employment

entry.label: Elevation
entry.description: height above or below sea level

entry.label: Environment
entry.description: environmental resources, protection and conservation

entry.label: Geoscientific Information
entry.description: information pertaining to earth sciences

entry.label: Health
entry.description: health, health services, human ecology, and safety

entry.label: Imagery Base Maps Earth Cover
entry.description: base maps

entry.label: Intelligence Military
entry.description: military bases, structures, activities

entry.label: Inland Waters
entry.description: inland water features, drainage systems and their characteristics

entry.label: Location
entry.description: positional information and services

entry.label: Oceans
entry.description: features and characteristics of salt water bodies (excluding inland waters)

entry.label: Planning Cadastre
entry.description: information used for appropriate actions for future use of the land

entry.label: Society
entry.description: characteristics of society and cultures

entry.label: Structure
entry.description: man-made construction

entry.label: Transportation
entry.description: means and aids for conveying persons and/or goods

entry.label: Utilities Communication
entry.description: energy, water and waste systems and communications infrastructure and services

entry.label: Geometry Only
entry.description: geometry objects without any additional structure which describes topology

entry.label: Topology 1D
entry.description: 1-dimensional topological complex

entry.label: Planar Graph
entry.description: 1-dimensional topological complex which is planar

entry.label: Full Planar Graph
entry.description: 2-dimensional topological complex which is planar

entry.label: Surface Graph
entry.description: 1-dimensional topological complex which is isomorphic to a subset of a surface

entry.label: Full Surface Graph
entry.description: 2-dimensional topological complex which is isomorphic to a subset of a surface

entry.label: Topology 3D
entry.description: 3-dimensional topological complex

entry.label: Full Topology 3D
entry.description: complete coverage of a 3D coordinate space

entry.label: Abstract
entry.description: topological complex without any specified geometric realization

element.help: This field is used to name the Basic Geodata as defined in the GeoIV Annex I, as it is possible that there are more than 1 "physical" datasets assigned to 1 legal entry. E.g.: Entry no. 47 "Geophysikalisches Kartenwerk" consists of 3 datasets "Geophysikalische Karten 1:500000", "Geophysikalische Spezialkarten" and "Gravimetrischer Atlas 1:100000"
